comments: Collector honoured with many plant names. Half brother to Jean Linden, same mother different fathers, died a clockmaker.
examples: So far, haven't found any names published by him.
source: Background information in Orchidee, 56(5): 598-603 (2005). Dates from Ceulemans, Jean Linden, explorer, master of the orchid: 24 (2007)
